articles.author: Jacob Shamsian
articles.title: Trump says number of 'non-working holidays' in America 'must change' in Juneteenth social media post - Business Insider
articles.description: President Donald Trump said American holidays cost billions of dollars in lost productivity and "must change."
articles.content:
In a social media post on Juneteenth, President Donald Trump said America has "too many" holidays where people don't work.
"Too many non-working holidays in America," Trump wrote on Truth Social lat… [+2637 chars]

articles.author: Mary Schlangenstein, Leen Al-Rashdan
articles.title: American, United Pause Middle East Flights on Rising Tension - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: American Airlines Group Inc. suspended daily flights from the US to the capital of Qatar, while United Airlines Holdings Inc. paused service to Dubai because of military actions and heightened tensions in the Middle East.
